name: else
brief: Extends the if structure allowing the program to choose between two or more blocks of code
description: Extends the if structure allowing the program to choose between two or more blocks of code. It specifies a block of code to execute when the expression in if is false.

parameters.name: expression
parameters.description: any valid expression that evaluates to true or false

parameters.name: statements
parameters.description: one or more statements to be executed
